subject: Horse Racing
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: With a date aboard Kentucky Derby winner Street Sense in the Travers Stakes on Saturday, jockey Calvin Borel is nursing his body and savoring a year to remember.
snippet: With a date aboard Kentucky Derby winner Street Sense in the Travers Stakes on Saturday, jockey Calvin Borel is nursing his body and savoring a year to remember.
